title: harikaambojhi paaDi
sahitya:
harikAmbOdhi pADi AvalAi azhaikkinrEn priya maNALanE guNALanE



anupallavi



sa ri ga pa dha nI enum saptasvara vEdamum jatIsvarangaLum shEra

tALa mELangaLuDan



caraNam



sAtvIka manaduDan sanmArga naDaiyuDan sAdhu sangattuDanE sadA kAla niSTaiyuDan

Atma samarpaNattAl aghandEya sukhantOya agha nATakanE saha

nATakang-kaNDE
